content.rendered: A very rare 40 year old Macallan bottled by the official bottlers at the time Gordon and Macphail and bottled in the late 1970’s by Gordon and MacPhail.  This particular expression of Macallan was imported for the Italian market by Pinerolo.

excerpt.rendered:
Bottle Size: 750ml
Alcohol Strength: 43%
Country: Scotland
Series: Gold Label Pure Malt Scotch
Cask Type: Sherry
